Ok that was lame...It really works i dont know how but it really works BUT i will be the helpful one Explain THE whole Situation so that noone has same problems again!So FIRST (after ofc u downloaded this torrent) U Download this 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3936499/Monopoly_2008_%5BEnglish%5D%5BPC%5D

(If for some reason the link doesnt direct u just Press on Pirate bay search Machine Monopoly 2008) 
SECOND After u dled Monopoly 2008 Use Magic ISO or whatever Mount machine u use(Magic iso is the best for the record) Find the folder NO CD (There's only one lol) and from there u will find a rar containing the SO desired crack exe 
THIRD unrar the rar and u get "MonopolyPB.exe" or something like that
FOURTH Copy that exe to the Monopoly Here and Now directory 
FIFTH Delete the ORIGINAL "Monopoly" exe
SIXTH Rename the "MonopolyPB" exe u just copied to "Monopoly"
FINALLY Play the game...Notice that the new exe will be Green instead of Blue which is in the Here and now version but doesnt matter it works!
Now i hope everyone has A CLEAR view of what to do instead of Roaming Downloading random Cracks.
